description:
All the things you hope you won’t need, in a little kit that saves the day if things go sideways. Repair, tighten, or patch tires or tubes – this kit is ideal for casual cyclists doing basic adjustments and repairs on the road or at home.

  • AWS-9.2 multi-tool folds up. Composite handle is 40% stronger than steel handles
  • Multi-tool includes 4mm, 5mm, and 6mm hex wrenches, along with T25 Torx® and flat blade screwdriver
  • TL-1.2 tire lever set includes 2 strong and smooth levers
  • 2 TB-2 tire boots to repair a cut or worn tire sidewall. Size is 76 x 45mm
  • GP-2 pre-glued super patch kit includes a self-adhesive tube patch (no messy glue) and sandpaper
name: Park Tool WTK-2 Essential Tool Kit
